snippet: In their first detailed timeline since the shooting last Wednesday, Army officials described how Specialist Ivan A. Lopez, 34, stayed on the move throughout the rampage, driving in his own vehicle to three buildings, shooting and killing a soldier in...
abstract: Army releases their first detailed timeline of Fort Hood, Tex, shooting rampage; officials describe how Specialist Ivan A Lopez, stayed on the move throughout the incident, driving in his own vehicle to three buildings, killing one soldier in each and shooting at soldiers en route, before he was confronted by a military police officer, put his gun to his head and took his own life.

byline.original: By MANNY FERNANDEZ and ALAN BLINDER

lead_paragraph: In their first detailed timeline since the shooting last Wednesday, Army officials described how Specialist Ivan A. Lopez, 34, stayed on the move throughout the rampage, driving in his own vehicle to three buildings, shooting and killing a soldier in each.

headline.main: Army Releases Detailed Account of Base Rampage
headline.print_headline: Army Releases Detailed Account of Base Rampage

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
